Text: Fortucast Offers Pick of the WeekFree Market TimersPST Serving Futures Traders Since FORTUCAST PICK OF THE WEEK STOCKS AND MARCH S P Stocks still have not rallied enough to confirm that the current downside correction is over We may have to wait until Jan for a bottom to finish and it still could be all the way at on S P futures or max We expect that once this correction is over the market should recover into Feb or so If the rally is not impulsive enough and remains corrective we will remain open to a low into Feb Worst downside is a move back to on DOW cash with support at on DOW cash and on NASDAQ cash LONGER TERM We are projecting NASDAQ to and the S P futures to This should take until Dec to completely manifest with a secondary high into March There could be a rocky period into May but then strong upside into Sept and continuing higher into Dec Swing Trade of the Week Shorting Bonds into Jan Bonds have confirmed an important retracement high at the region Retracements into Feb should be used to accumulate put post ions and short futures positions using stops above Next swing low should be at least Feb Downside target forthcoming Longer term weekly charts project much lower prices into Dec Barry Rosen PM WHY FORTUCAST Take advantage of our years of experience and the accuracy of our longterm forecasts In a published article in when almost everyone was very bearish on the stock market Fortucast predicted higher prices for stocks into and targeted DOW when most advisors were worried about another crash Check out our offer below to get our latest thinking DAILY TIMERSFREE WEEK TRIALS Delivered nights per week for markets of the next dayClick here for more information Fortucast Financial Timer Fortucast Agricultural Timer Fortucast Mutual Fund Timer Click here for free trial order form Or call order Fortucast Market Timing PO Box Sedona AZ fax international GMT hrs wwwfortucastcom
